          DIM SUM     STEAMED DUMPLINGS         EDAMAME DUMPLINGS
A vegetarian mix of edamame, silken tofu, ginger, lemongrass, and agave nectar with a hint of spice $3.25         LEMONGRASS CHICKEN
Chicken breast, Napa cabbage, cilantro, ginger, garlic and lemongrass $3.25         VEGETABLE
Mix of vegetables with ginger and Thai basil $3.25         PORK
Our signature pork dumplings with ground pork and vegetables $3.25         SHRIMP
Tender shrimp, ginger, carrots and green onion $4       OTHER DIM SUM OFFERINGS         FLAMING RED WONTONS
Pork wontons in a spicy garlic and sesame soy sauce finished with scallions (6 per order) $5         EDAMAME
Steamed to order and served with a light sprinkling of Kosher salt $4         CHANG'S CHICKEN LETTUCE WRAPS
Our signature appetizer. Wok-seared minced chicken, mushrooms, green onions, and water chestnuts served over crispy rice sticks and served with cool, crisp lettuce cups $6         CHANG'S VEGETARIAN LETTUCE WRAPS
A vegetarian version of our signature appetizer made with tofu $6         CRISPY GREEN BEANS
Fresh green beans, lightly battered and served crispy with a spicy, tangy dipping sauce $4         CRAB WONTONS
Crispy wontons filled with a creamy mixture of crab meat, minced red and green bell peppers, green onions, ginger and garlic, served with a spicy plum sauce (6 per order) $5         DYNAMITE SHRIMP
Crispy shrimp tossed in a zesty sauce $7       STREET FARE     TRADITIONS         EGG ROLLS
Hand-rolled with marinated pork and vegetables. Served as a pair, this flavorful tradition is perfect with our special sweet & sour mustard sauce (2 per order) $4         SPRING ROLLS
A traditional favorite that we prepare daily (2 per order) $3         TUNA TATAKI CRISP*
Sliced Ahi tuna, seared rare on a crispy wonton, topped with fresh diced Ahi tuna, crisp cucumber and scallions tossed in a citrus-sesame soy sauce. Finished with a hint of spice and toasted sesame seeds (3 per order) $5         NORTHERN STYLE SPARE RIBS
Tender wok-braised ribs served with a five-spice salt (4 per order) $6         CHANG'S SPARE RIBS
Wok-seared with an Asian barbecue sauce (4 per order) $6
item.how_to_find_us: tables in bar area are reserved for us
